variable.name: SAMPID
variable.description: Sample ID, GTEx Public Sample ID

variable.name: SMATSSCR
variable.description: Autolysis Score
variable.comment: Autolysis The destruction of organism cells or tissues by the organisms' own enzymes or processes.

variable.name: SMCAT
variable.description: Category or classifier of a set of responses, indicates the color of the sample collection kit
variable.comment: Sample kit collection type Indicates the type and color of the sample kit used in sample collection.
variable.value: Aqua Kit: Organ and Tissue Donation
Yellow Kit: Skin and Blood Donation

variable.name: SMCENTER
variable.description: Code for BSS collection site
variable.comment: Coded site or center Indicates the site that enrolled the donor, brain subregions may have more than one site.

variable.name: SMMTRLTP
variable.description: Current material type of the sample as stored at the LDACC
variable.comment: Generated at LDACC Indicates the current material type at LDACC.

variable.name: SMNOTES
variable.description: Internal notes about the sample generated by the LDACC
variable.comment: Generated at LDACC Provides any notes generated by the LDACC during sample processing.

variable.name: SMOMTRLTP
variable.description: Original material type of the collected sample
variable.comment: Generated at LDACC Indicates the original material type collected.

variable.name: SMPTHNTS
variable.description: Pathology Notes, notes from PRC Report
variable.comment: Comments from pathological review Any comments the pathologist filling out the PRC form wishes to make concerning the tissue quality.

variable.name: SMRIN
variable.description: RIN Number
variable.comment: Generated at LDACC The RNA Integrity Number, a basic measure of the quality of RNA isolated.

variable.name: SMSMPSTE
variable.description: Tissue Location
variable.comment: Tissue Location The location on the organ or tissue from which the specimen was collected.

variable.name: SMSTYP
variable.description: Indicates whether sample is a tumor or a normal
variable.comment: Generated at LDACC Tumor=cancerous or benign mass, Normal=normal tissue.

variable.name: SMTS
variable.description: Tissue Type, area from which the tissue sample was taken. This is a parent value to SMTSD.
variable.comment: Tissue Type The type of Tissue that was collected.

variable.name: SMTSC
variable.description: Prosector Comments
variable.comment: Prosector Comments Any comments the prosector wishes to make concerning this case with respect to tissue collection.

variable.name: SMTSD
variable.description: Tissue Type, more specific detail of tissue type
variable.comment: Tissue Type The type of Tissue that was collected on a Donor by Donor basis.

variable.name: SMTSISCH
variable.description: Total Ischemic time for a sample
variable.comment: Sample Ischemic Time Interval between actual death, presumed death, or cross clampl application and final tissue stabilization.

variable.name: SMTSPAX
variable.description: Time a sample spent in the PAXgene fixative
variable.comment: PAXgene Fixative Time Total time a sample spent in the PAXgene fixative.

variable.name: SMTSTPTREF
variable.description: Time point reference for Start and End times of sample procurement
variable.comment: Time point reference for Start and End times of sample procurement Indicates whether the sample ischemic time begins at the donor's actual death, presumed death, or when the cross clamp was applied in the case of surgical donors.

variable.name: SMNABTCH
variable.description: Nucleic Acid Isolation Batch ID
variable.comment: Generated at LDACC Batch when DNA/RNA was isolated and extracted from a sample.

variable.name: SMNABTCHT
variable.description: Type of nucleic acid isolation batch
variable.comment: Generated at LDACC The process by which DNA/RNA was isolated.

variable.name: SMNABTCHD
variable.description: Date of nucleic acid isolation batch
variable.comment: Generated at LDACC The date on which DNA/RNA was isolated.

variable.name: SMGEBTCH
variable.description: Genotype or Expression Batch ID
variable.comment: Generated at LDACC Batch when DNA/RNA from a sample was analyzed.

variable.name: SMGEBTCHD
variable.description: Date of genotype or expression batch
variable.comment: Generated at LDACC The data on which DNA/RNA was analyzed.

variable.name: SMGEBTCHT
variable.description: Type of genotype or expression batch
variable.comment: Generated at LDACC The technology used to analyze DNA/RNA.

variable.name: ANALYTE_TYPE
variable.description: Analyte Type
variable.comment: Generated at LDACC Indicates whether DNA or RNA was isolated and quantified from a sample.

variable.name: SMTORMVE
variable.description: Samples flagged for removal from analysis
variable.comment: Generated at LDACC These samples have been identified by the GTEx analysis working group as suboptimal for use in analysis. The reason a sample was flagged is given in the SMBADIND, SMBADSMP, SMLOWRDS, and SMFLGRMRK fields.

variable.name: SMBADIND
variable.description: Sample is flagged because the donor's samples are generally of lower quality
variable.comment: Generated at LDACC The analysis working group has observed that samples from some donors are generally of lower quality and therefore produce lower quality molecular data.

variable.name: SMBADSMP
variable.description: Sample is generally of lower quality
variable.comment: Generated at LDACC Some samples are generally of lower quality, which is independent of the quality of all other samples from the same donor.

variable.name: SMLOWRDS
variable.description: Sample has a low read count
variable.comment: Generated at LDACC For some samples, there are generally too few reads to accurately characterize the mRNA expression profile.

variable.name: SMFLGRMRK
variable.description: Additional remarks about flagged samples
variable.comment: Generated at LDACC These comments are generally applicable only to genotyped samples.

variable.name: SMAFRZE
variable.description: Samples included in the GTEx Analysis Freeze
variable.comment: Generated at LDACC These samples have been identified as those best suited for use in analysis with a specific focus on eQTL analysis.
